name: Ascend Collection Castillo Real

reviews.title: Loved this Hotel!!!
reviews.text: I booked this hotel on the recommendation of reviews on Trip Advisor and we were not disappointed. There was a little work going on in the hotel, but that was not a problem.
Loved the pool area and jacuzzi. They could change where they play the music at the pool because it was very hard to hear with the water tree in the pool.
reviews.title: Not what expected

reviews.text: The hotel paid alot of attention to detail with the marble and tile and colors. It was VERY clean. I loved our spacious room, although next time I will try and get a poolside/oceanview room. The bathrooms were wonderful.
reviews.title: Fabulous hotel

reviews.text: There were only 2 negatives and one was huge. The first is the very poor lighting in the room at night. It was almost impossible to read anything after dark. The other thing that I was disappointed in was the staff. We really did not have a complaint at all until we left and really wanted to express to them at check out how much we loved the hotel and would recommend it and be back, I paid my bill. I did not get a thank-you or how was your stay. I stood there for a second dumbfounded because I was basically dismissed by the front desk person as he turned his back and walked away before I could even begin to tell him thanks. This seemed to be pretty common in St. Augustine though, we were almost never thanked or asked by anyone how we were enjoying our stay.
reviews.title: JUST RIGHT!

reviews.text: Regardless, we will return to this hotel and we will enjoy ourselves again, even if no one cares!!!
reviews.title: Stayed with young child...
Clean, Beautiful- A Must
reviews.text: Okay, I am a "hotel" snob so I went out on a limb and stayed here without ever seeing the place! To my surprise it was as nice- if not nicer- than several Marriott's I've stayed in. The rooms are clean and the shower is huge. It is a smaller hotel, very quaint and personable. The steam and sauna were great,and they have a little spa! It may not be on-on the beach but it basically is! I mean, you can't see the ocean from your window but it is very convenient to walk to. So close that I could go to and from the bathroom and it would take me no time. Stay here if you plan a trip to Saint Augustine. It is the best place BY FAR to stay at the beach.

Beautiful hotel, clean rooms and wonderful staff. The only drawback is that it is not oceanfront...not that there are many in the area that are. But we were expecting it to be right on the ocean and fortunately our room was on the 4th floor or you wouldn't even be able to see the ocean in your oceanfront room.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.text: The Castillo Real is a real gem. Rooms are large and comfortable. There is free WIFI in the room, a microwave and a fridge, bathrobes, and thick, soft towels. Our room had a huge walk-in shower.
reviews.title: A truly wonderful property
Nice hotel on St. Augustine Beach
reviews.text: The staff is nothing less than excellent. They will do anything they can to make your stay pleasant.

We stayed here for one night on our way to Port Canaveral. We were very pleased with this hotel. The room was large and very clean. The bath area was beautiful. The pool was nice as well. Free Wi-Fi is a great benefit - all hotels should offer this as a free amenity. It is very close to the beach. Overall as great stay. I would stay there again!
reviews.title: Great hotel.

aka: Ascend Collection Castillo Real Hotel Saint Augustine Beach
